name: Sorcer Tactics Trial: A Magick Attack
description: In order to learn the basic tactics of Sorcerer, challenge the trial of the Training Chapel
steps: Speak with Wilson in the Training Chapel
Attack the enemy 3 times with your Magick Ball
Attack the enemy 3 times with Magick Trap
Charge a spell and reposition yourself when it is fully charged
Charge a spell with lock-on switched off
Cling to the enemy in the deeper chamber and use Magic Cracker
Collect the proof of completing the trial
Report back to Renton in the White Dragon Temple
